attributes.action: show us that our leaders care and provide a response to all petitions over 5000 signatures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is apparent from viewing the petitions listed on this site, that the government appear prepared only to respond to petitions where the response is easy, for example where a petition proposes legislation that is already in place. The government makes these easy responses rather than the more difficult task of responding to controversial or complex issues which people really care about. Show your country that you care and do us the decency of responding to petitions that we put effort into. Today this would only be approximately 30 petitions, so 'should' not take a lot of resource to do. Also show us the result and action taken on said petitions, please.

rejection.details:
The government responds to all serious petitions with more than 200 signatures, and all responses are shown here:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/list/closed
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
